comments: S.G. Lee in Acta Phytotax. Sin., 15(2): 110 (1977) = Lee, Shu Kang according to the index of that volume.
examples: Sapium chihsinianum S.K. Lee in Acta Phytotax. Sin., 5: 121 (1956). Curcuma kwangsiensis S.G. Lee & C.F. Liang in Acta Phytotax. Sin., 15(2): 110 (1977).
